thread.title: Maryanne weinreich
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Maryanne weinreich

author: Maryanne weinreich
title: Maryanne weinreich
text: I have been ordering from white mountain puzzles for years. I get exactly what I want every time. I receive my puzzles in 1-3 days from fed ex. I just type in whatever I am looking for in search, for instance 1000 or 500 piece. Or the artist, or the topic and bam a puzzle pops up exactly suiting my needs. Low on money? Go to sale or discounted items. Need glue ? Go to accessories! Everything in one site. You can also track your package. I just ordered a puzzle Sunday and it's due here Thursday. I recommend white mountain puzzles to all my friends. Thank you
